codingQuestions.question: Two Sum Problem: Given an array of integers, find two numbers that add up to a specific target.
Reverse Integer: Reverse digits of an integer.
Palindrome Number: Determine whether an integer is a palindrome.
Roman to Integer: Convert a Roman numeral to an integer.
Longest Common Prefix: Write a function to find the longest common prefix string amongst an array of strings.
Valid Parentheses: Determine if a string containing just the characters '(', ')', '{', '}', '[', ']' is valid.
Merge Two Sorted Lists: Merge two sorted linked lists and return it as a new sorted list.
Remove Duplicates from Sorted Array: Remove duplicates in-place from a sorted array.
Max Subarray: Find the contiguous subarray with the maximum sum.
Length of Last Word: Given a string s, return the length of the last word.
Plus One: Increment a non-negative integer represented as an array of digits.
Add Binary: Given two binary strings, return their sum as a binary string.
Climbing Stairs: Calculate the number of distinct ways to climb a staircase with n steps.
Remove Element: Remove all instances of a value in-place from a list.
Implement strStr(): Implement the strStr() function that finds the first occurrence of a substring.
Count and Say: Implement the count-and-say sequence.
Max Depth of Binary Tree: Find the maximum depth of a binary tree.
Binary Tree Inorder Traversal: Perform an inorder traversal of a binary tree.
Symmetric Tree: Check if a binary tree is symmetric.
Minimum Depth of Binary Tree: Find the minimum depth of a binary tree.
Path Sum: Given a binary tree and a sum, check if the tree has a root-to-leaf path with the given sum.
Linked List Cycle: Determine if a linked list has a cycle.
Palindrome Linked List: Check if a linked list is a palindrome.
Merge K Sorted Lists: Merge k sorted linked lists into one sorted list.
Sort Colors: Sort an array with elements 0, 1, 2 (representing colors) in-place.
First Missing Positive: Find the smallest missing positive integer from an unsorted array.
Container with Most Water: Find two lines on an x-axis that, together with the axis, forms a container holding the most water.
Longest Consecutive Sequence: Find the length of the longest consecutive elements sequence.
Word Ladder: Find the shortest transformation sequence from a start word to an end word.
Trapping Rain Water: Calculate the amount of water that can be trapped after it rains.
Median of Two Sorted Arrays: Find the median of two sorted arrays.
Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters: Find the length of the longest substring without repeating characters.
Zigzag Conversion: Convert a string to a zigzag pattern and return the result.
Container With Most Water: Find the maximum amount of water a container can store given an array of heights.
3Sum: Find all unique triplets in an array that sum up to zero.
Letter Combinations of a Phone Number: Return all possible letter combinations that the number could represent.
Remove Nth Node from End of List: Remove the nth node from the end of a linked list.
Valid Sudoku: Check if a 9x9 Sudoku board is valid.
Sudoku Solver: Solve a given Sudoku puzzle.
Search in Rotated Sorted Array: Find the index of a target value in a rotated sorted array.
Combination Sum: Find all unique combinations in an array where the sum equals a target.
Word Search: Check if a word exists in a grid of letters.
Jump Game: Determine if you can reach the last index of an array.
Permutations: Return all possible permutations of a list of numbers.
Unique Paths: Calculate the number of unique paths in a grid from top-left to bottom-right.
Minimum Path Sum: Find the minimum sum path from top-left to bottom-right of a grid.
Edit Distance: Calculate the minimum number of operations required to convert one string to another.
Scramble String: Determine if a string is a scramble of another string.
Binary Tree Maximum Path Sum: Find the maximum path sum in a binary tree.
Best Time to Buy and Sell Stock: Find the maximum profit that can be achieved from buying and selling a stock.
Maximal Rectangle: Find the maximal rectangle containing only 1's in a binary matrix.
Longest Increasing Subsequence: Find the length of the longest increasing subsequence in an array.
Word Break: Determine if a string can be segmented into a space-separated sequence of one or more dictionary words.
Insert Interval: Insert a new interval into a list of non-overlapping intervals.
Merge Intervals: Merge all overlapping intervals in a list.
Spiral Matrix: Return all elements of a matrix in spiral order.
Kth Largest Element in an Array: Find the kth largest element in an unsorted array.
Maximum Product Subarray: Find the contiguous subarray within an array that has the largest product.
Product of Array Except Self: Find an array such that each element is the product of all other elements in the array.
Find Minimum in Rotated Sorted Array: Find the minimum element in a rotated sorted array.
Search a 2D Matrix: Determine if a target value is in a 2D matrix.
Pow(x, n): Implement the function to calculate x raised to the power n.
Valid Palindrome: Determine if a given string is a valid palindrome.
Single Number: Find the element that appears only once in an array where every other element appears twice.
House Robber: Determine the maximum amount of money you can rob from a series of houses without robbing two consecutive houses.
Word Ladder II: Return all the shortest transformation sequences from a start word to an end word.
Surrounded Regions: Capture all regions surrounded by 'X' in a 2D board.
Number of Islands: Find the number of islands in a 2D grid.
Clone Graph: Clone an undirected graph.
Max Points on a Line: Determine the maximum number of points that lie on the same straight line.
Largest Rectangle in Histogram: Find the largest rectangle area in a histogram.
Sliding Window Maximum: Find the maximum value in each sliding window of size k.
Min Stack: Design a stack that supports push, pop, top, and retrieving the minimum element in constant time.
LRU Cache: Design and implement a data structure for Least Recently Used (LRU) cache.
Flatten Nested List Iterator: Implement an iterator to flatten a nested list of integers.
Find the Duplicate Number: Find the duplicate number in an array where numbers are between 1 and n.
Find the Celebrity: Identify the celebrity in a group of people.
Shortest Palindrome: Find the shortest palindrome that can be created by adding characters in front of a string.
Remove Invalid Parentheses: Remove the minimum number of invalid parentheses to make a string valid.
Course Schedule: Determine if you can finish all courses given the course prerequisites.
Decode Ways: Given a string, determine the number of ways to decode it.
Distinct Subsequences: Find the number of distinct subsequences of a string that equals another string.
Combination Sum IV: Find the number of possible combinations that add up to a target.
Maximum Subarray Sum with One Deletion: Find the maximum subarray sum with at most one deletion.
Non-overlapping Intervals: Find the minimum number of intervals to remove to make the rest non-overlapping.
Array Partition I: Maximize the sum of min pairs in an array.
Island Perimeter: Find the perimeter of an island in a 2D grid.
Maximum Width of Binary Tree: Find the maximum width of a binary tree.
Employee Free Time: Find the common free time between all employees given their schedules.
All Paths From Source to Target: Find all possible paths from a source to a target in a directed acyclic graph.
